long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GitHub Actions Status Monitor

Stay on top of your GitHub Actions workflows with the GitHub Actions Status Monitor Chrome extension. This tool is designed to help developers efficiently track the status and performance of their workflows directly from the GitHub repositories page.

Key Features:

    Real-Time Status Updates: Instantly see the status of your GitHub Actions workflows with live updates.
    Running Duration Display: Monitor how long each workflow has been running to better manage your build times.
    Blinking Icon Notification: Never miss a running workflow! A blinking icon appears on the repositories page when a workflow is in progress.
    Quick Access: Click on the blinking icon to be instantly redirected to the detailed workflow page for further insights.

Enhance your GitHub workflow management and save time with the GitHub Actions Status Monitor. Install now and streamline your development process!
